body:
## just try it out
`$ go get github.com/jackdoe/godzilla`

`$ git clone https://github.com/jackdoe/godzilla.git`

`$ cd godzilla/example/blog && go run web.go`


***

open http://localhost:8080 and enjoy :)

> http://localhost:8080/admin/ is for the admin panel 
> (works only if opened from localhost)

![post list](http://img545.imageshack.us/img545/1425/screenshot20120827at501.png)
![single post](http://img163.imageshack.us/img163/6403/screenshot20120827at532.png)
name: Godzilla
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
